scripts.build: yarn build-clean && yarn build-sass && yarn build-autoprefix && yarn build-cleancss
scripts.build-autoprefix: postcss --use autoprefixer --map false --dir css css/ds.css css/ds-utilities.css
scripts.build-cleancss: cleancss -o css/ds.min.css css/ds.css & cleancss -o css/ds-utilities.min.css css/ds-utilities.css
scripts.build-sass: node-sass -q --output-style expanded --source-map true ds.sass css/ds.css & node-sass -q --output-style expanded --source-map true ds-utilities.sass css/ds-utilities.css
